API Reference¶

pytdt¶

class pytdt.pytdt.Block(path)¶

Bases: object

Read TDT block.

Parameters

path (str) – Path to TDT block

Returns

block – Object for interfacing with a TDT block

Return type

TDT_block object

property data¶

Data dictionary containing read stores, where each key is the store name

Each store itself is a dictionary, with the following keys:

Key

Value

type

type of store (stream, epoch, etc)

data

data for the store

fs

sampling rate (stream only)

nChan

number of channels (stream only)
read_stores(stores=None, reload=False)¶

Read specified stores. If no stores are specified, all stores are read

Parameters

  • stores (str, list) – Name or names of stores to be read. If None, all stores are read.

  • reload (bool, optional) – If true, forces reload of stores. Else, skips stores already loaded.

property stores¶
pytdt.pytdt.is_block(path)¶

Checks if the given path is a tdt block.

Parameters

block (str) – Block path

Returns

is_block – True if path is a tdt block, else False

Return type

bool

pytdt.pytdt.is_tank(path)¶

Check if the given path is a tdt tank. A tank is any directory with one or more blocks.

Parameters

block (str) – Block path

Returns

is_block – True if path is a tdt block, else False

Return type

bool
